name: liquid-liberty-subquery
description: Subgraph for fetching OHLCV data for TradingView price charts

scripts.build:sepolia: cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=sepolia npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=sepolia npm run build
scripts.build:pulse: cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=pulse npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=pulse npm run build
scripts.build:local: cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=local npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=local npm run build
scripts.test: npm run build && npx subql-node-ethereum test
